trans-unit.source: Defines a base class for all deployment-related exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Define uma classe base para todas as exceções relacionadas à implantação.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException> is the base class of all deployment-related exceptions thrown by the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException> é a classe base de todas as exceções relacionadas à implantação gerada pelo <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents text as a series of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: Representa o texto como uma série de caracteres Unicode.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" />.

trans-unit.source: Stores all the data needed to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: Armazena todos os dados necessários para serializar ou desserializar um objeto.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Describes the source and destination of a given serialized stream, and provides an additional caller-defined context.
trans-unit.target: Descreve a origem e o destino de um determinado fluxo serializado e fornece um contexto adicional definido pelo chamador.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents text as a series of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: Representa o texto como uma série de caracteres Unicode.

trans-unit.source: Represents errors that occur during application execution.
trans-unit.target: Representa erros que ocorrem durante a execução do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentException" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> que mantém os dados de objeto serializados sobre a exceção que está sendo lançada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> que contém informações contextuais sobre a fonte ou o destino.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: Define o <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> com informações sobre a exceção.
